items.title: roborock’s latest and upgraded Qrevo CurvX robot vac & mop with premium features hits a new $850 low (Reg. $1,500)
items.summary:
Through its official Amazon storefront, roborock is giving us the best price yet on its roborock Qrevo CurvX Robot Vacuum and Mop at $849.99 shipped. Occasionally rising back to its $1,500 MSRP, we more often see it discounted down between $1,000 and $1,100, with some occasional falls lower, most recently to $900 back at the end of October. Today’s deal is dropping even further than ever before, giving you a 43% markdown that cuts $650 from the tag for the best new price we have tracked, just in time to pick it up during your Black Friday shopping.

items.title: UPDF is the $42 AI PDF whisperer you didn’t know you needed (Reg. $150)
items.summary:
Working with PDFs is equally the best and worst of times. What you lose in the difficulty and cost of editing is made up for by universal compatibility and excellent print formatting. However, with UPDF, you can disregard the sunk-cost fallacy and edit your PDFs in peace. Get it now for $41.97 (Reg. $149.99) with code EDIT — its lowest price yet.

items.title: NetChoice sues Virginia to block its one-hour social media limit for kids
items.summary: The tech industry trade group NetChoice is suing Virginia over a new law that will restrict minors from using social media for more than one hour per day. items.title: Meta releases a new tool to protect reels creators from having their work stolen
items.summary: On Monday, Meta introduced Facebook content protection, a mobile tool designed to detect when a creator's original reels posted to Facebook are being used without their permission. The new tool extends to Instagram too.

items.title: Ford turns to Amazon to give used cars sales a boost
items.summary: Amazon Autos, which kicked off last year with Hyundai, initially started with new cars. The deal with Ford pushes it into used car territory.

items.title: Our readers can exclusively save up to $190 on TheraBody massagers, face masks, more starting from $170
items.summary:
We’ve secured exclusive savings on six Therabody devices from Wellbots, just in time to snag one during your early Black Friday holiday shopping needs. Among the three massage guns in this lineup, things start with the TheraGun Mini 3 at $169.99 shipped, after using the exclusive code 9TO5THER50 at checkout. Outside of discounts, you’d be paying $220 for this massager at full price, which we’ve mostly seen keep above $190 over the year, save for occasional drops lower to $179, $170, $169, and the one-time $168 low we saw during last month’s Prime Day event. The exclusive deal here gives you a total $50 markdown off the going rate, landing it at the third-best price we have tracked – just $2 above that one-time low. Head below to check out the full lineup of exclusive massagers, face masks, and more.

items.title: Cisco acquires translation startup EzDubs
items.summary: Cisco has acquired Y Combinator-backed translation app EzDub to integrate it into its communication suite.

items.title: France investigating Vinted over alleged links to pornographic content
items.summary: Some sellers were found to be luring viewers to their personal pages on adult platforms such as OnlyFans.

items.title: Sequoia-backed fintech Aspora will let Indian diaspora pay bills back home
items.summary: The startup said that until now, users had to either transfer the money to their Indian accounts or ask someone to handle the bills for them. The other option for them was to use their foreign cards and try and pay bills while facing high charges and payment failures.

items.title: Louvre closes gallery due to structural issue
items.summary: The Campana Gallery, which host Greek ceramics, will remain closed as beams supporting the floor above are checked.

items.summary: To get started, users need to describe where, when, and how they want to travel. Flight Deals will then use AI to display the best bargains available.
